subject: College Athletics
Basketball
lead_paragraph: Arizona has placed its men’s basketball program on probation for the 2010-11 and 2011-12 seasons for violations by the Hall of Fame coach Lute Olson related to an off-season A.A.U. tournament in 2008.
snippet: Arizona has placed its men’s basketball program on probation for the 2010-11 and 2011-12 seasons for violations by the Hall of Fame coach Lute Olson related to an off-season A.A.U. tournament in 2008.
